questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The building _______ (complete) by the end of next year.'
Spot the mistake: 'The documents will be send by her tomorrow.'
Change the sentence to future passive tense: 'They will launch the product.'
Fill in the blank: 'The project _______ (not approve) by the committee.'
Spot the mistake: 'By next year, a new school will built in the area.'
Change the sentence to future passive tense: 'She will present the award.'
questions.answer: The award will be presented by her.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'All the arrangements _______ (handle) by the event manager.'
Spot the mistake: 'The experiment will be conduct next week.'
Change the sentence to future passive tense: 'They will fix the computer.'
Fill in the blank: 'A new law _______ (enact) next year.'
Spot the mistake: 'The painting will be display in the museum.'
Change the sentence to future passive tense: 'He will teach the course.'
questions.answer: The course will be taught by him.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The work _______ (finish) by 5 pm tomorrow.'
Spot the mistake: 'The new policy will be implement next month.'
Change the sentence to future passive tense: 'She will write the book.'
questions.answer: The book will be written by her.

questions.prompt: Fill in the blank: 'The event _______ (organize) by a team of professionals.'
Spot the mistake: 'A meeting will be hold on Friday.'

questions.answer: The meal will be prepared by them.
